div.p: This case-sensitive code system https://fhir.nhs.uk/England/CodeSystem/FlagProxyRole defines the following codes:

tr.td: Best interest decision made on behalf of the patient (Mental Capacity Act 2005)
Lasting power of attorney for health and welfare, or court-appointed deputy, or equivalent
Other legitimate patient representative - parental responsibility

description.value: A CodeSystem to identify the type/role of the proxy involved
